    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange t)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the Request Query. Runs Solver with the arguments contained in the Query. Responds to the Load Balancer with the Image resulting from the execution of the Solver. Gets the Metrics associated with the Request. Calculates the Cost resulting from the Solver Metrics and stores it in the MSS, which will later be fetched by the LoadBalancer.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
        Parameters:
        t - Encapsulates an HTTP Request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
